extendedInfo.description: Enjoy beautiful Night view of global landmarks in beautiful buildings fire HD live wallpaper. An incredible Android live wallpaper displays group of particles which strikes randomly on the screen for you to have for free!!  Particles strikes randomly just as stars shine in the galaxy. Wallpaper includes beautiful images of grand and historic places like The Eiffel tower, The Colosseum, The Sydney Opera House and The Shwedagon Pagoda. You can choose your favorite background.The Eiffel Tower is a puddled iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris,France named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower. The Colosseum, or the Coliseum, originally the Flavian Amphitheatre, is an elliptical amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy, the largest ever built in the Roman Empire. These two belongs to one of the seven wonders of the worldThe Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. The Shwedagon Pagoda,;officially titled Shwedagon Zedi Daw, also known in English as the the Golden Pagoda temple, is a 99 metres gilded pagoda and stupa located in Yangon, Burma.You can also use wikipedia to  know more about these places.Features: - HD graphics and openGL. -Optimized Battery Usage. -Compatible with 99% android devices -Four beautiful backgrounds to choose fromIf you love these global landmarks then this is the cool app for you. Let your screen come alive with mesmerizing night views of these stunning buildings and magical firework effect . If you like it send this magical live Wallpaper share it with your family, spouse or loved ones and . Very soon we will be releasing more.Also, no internet or wifi connection is required for this application. The awesome application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V.The application works perfect on all mobiles and gives you a thrilling experience on tablets. . The application requires some special permissions like GPS,etc. but that is only for ad networks and no other reason.If you like this application you can share our application using Facebook,Twitter,Gmail to your awesome friends.   Tags: magical effect, night sky, shooting stars, free live wallpaper, dynamic wallpaper, fireworks live wallpaper
